scripts.cypress:local: cypress open --e2e --browser chrome --env env=local,TAGS="@local and not @ignore"
scripts.cypress:dev: cypress open --e2e --browser chrome --env env=dev,TAGS="@dev and not @ignore"
scripts.cypress:local:all: npm run config:reports && npm run delete:reports && cypress run --env env=local,TAGS="@local and not @ignore" --browser chrome && npm run report
scripts.cypress:dev:all: npm run config:reports && npm run delete:reports && cypress run --env env=dev,TAGS="@dev and not @ignore" --browser chrome && npm run report
scripts.cypress:test:all: npm run config:reports && npm run delete:reports && cypress run --env env=test,TAGS="@test and not @ignore" --browser chrome && npm run report
scripts.cypress:local:payments: npm run config:reports && npm run delete:reports && cypress run --spec "cypress/integration/features/14_LocalPaymentsTests.feature" --env env=local,TAGS="@local and @payments and not @ignore" --browser chrome && npm run report
